snippet.title: Goat Simulator Remastered – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The greatest simulation game known to man and goat returns, with familiar caprine chaos, upgraded graphics and lighting, many intentional features that definitely aren’t bugs, and fan-favorite DLCs, all in one package!

Goat Simulator Remastered is coming to Xbox X|S, PlayStation 5, Steam, Epic, and Windows Store in 2024.

Wishlist everywhere now. Baa

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1762930/Goat_Simulator_Remastered
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p71qfsc7q34
Windows: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9ng0pk8sqvk2
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/sv-se/concept/10003965
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/goat-simulator-remastered-926445
